description: The military arm of the http://anidb.net/ch2441 [Earth Federation]. The Federation Forces are divided into several branches, including land, sea, air, and space forces. Until mass production of the http://anidb.net/ch10989 [RGM-79 GM] begins in the final weeks of the One Year War, the Federation Forces are forced to battle the http://anidb.net/ch2422 [Principality of Zeon]`s mobile suits using http://anidb.net/ch117985 [conventional tanks], planes, and space fighters. Even in the postwar years, the Federation Forces are usually inferior to their opponents in terms of skill, morale, and equipment.
name: Earth Federation Forces
